TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Call extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an ongoing phone call that the in-call app should present to the user.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddConferenceParticipants(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Net.Uri> participants) cil managed

Docs.param: participants to be pulled to existing call.
Docs.summary: Pulls participants to existing call by forming a conference call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Answer(valuetype Android.Telecom.VideoProfileState videoState) cil managed

Docs.param: The video state in which to answer the call.
Docs.summary: Instructs this #STATE_RINGINGCall to answer.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The key to retrieve the optional PhoneAccounts Telecom can bundle with its Call extras.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Obtains a list of canned, pre-configured message responses to present to the user as ways of rejecting an incoming Call using via a text message.
Docs.value: A list of canned text message responses.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Obtains the children of this conference Call, if any.
Docs.value: The children of this Call if this Call is a conference, or an empty List otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Conference(class Android.Telecom.Call callToConferenceWith) cil managed

Docs.param: The other call with which to conference.
Docs.summary: Instructs this Call to enter a conference.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the list of Calls with which this Call is allowed to conference.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Deflect(class Android.Net.Uri address) cil managed

Docs.param: The address to which the call will be deflected.
Docs.summary: Instructs this #STATE_RINGINGCall to deflect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Disconnect() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instructs this Call to disconnect.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Event reported from the telecom framework when a diagnostic message previously raised with #EVENT_DISPLAY_DIAGNOSTIC_MESSAGE has cleared and is no longer pertinent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Event reported from the Telecom stack to report an in-call diagnostic message which the dialer app may opt to display to the user.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: CharSequence extra used with #EVENT_DISPLAY_DIAGNOSTIC_MESSAGE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Integer extra representing a message ID for a message posted via #EVENT_DISPLAY_DIAGNOSTIC_MESSAGE.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra key used to indicate the time (in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC) when the last outgoing emergency call was made.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra key used to indicate whether a CallScreeningService has requested to silence the ringtone for a call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Key for extra used to pass along a list of PhoneAccountSuggestions to the in-call UI when a call enters the #STATE_SELECT_PHONE_ACCOUNT state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the child Call in a generic conference that is currently active.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Telecom.Call/Details GetDetails() cil managed

Docs.summary: Obtains an object containing call details.
Docs.returns: A Details object. Depending on the state of the Call, the result may be null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Telecom.Call/RttCall GetRttCall() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns this call's RttCall object.
Docs.returns: A Call.RttCall. null if there is no active RTT connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void HandoverTo (Android.Telecom.PhoneAccountHandle toHandle, Android.Telecom.VideoProfileState videoState, Android.OS.Bundle extras);

.method public hidebysig instance void HandoverTo(class Android.Telecom.PhoneAccountHandle toHandle, valuetype Android.Telecom.VideoProfileState videoState, class Android.OS.Bundle extras) cil managed

Docs.param: PhoneAccountHandle of the ConnectionService to handover this call to.
Indicates the video state desired after the handover (see the STATE_* constants defined in VideoProfile).
Bundle containing extra information to be passed to the ConnectionService
Docs.summary: Initiates a handover of this Call to the ConnectionService identified by toHandle.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlayDtmfTone(char digit) cil managed

Docs.param: A character representing the DTMF digit for which to play the tone. This value must be one of '0' through '9', '*' or '#'.
Docs.summary: Instructs this Call to play a dual-tone multi-frequency signaling (DTMF) tone.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telecom.CallRejectReason RejectReasonDeclined = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Telecom.CallRejectReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reject reason used with #reject(int) to indicate that the user is rejecting this call because they have declined to answer it.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Telecom.CallRejectReason RejectReasonUnwanted = (2)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Telecom.CallRejectReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reject reason used with #reject(int) to indicate that the user is rejecting this call because it is an unwanted call.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Obtains the post-dial sequence remaining to be emitted by this Call, if any.
